name: Rosy,My Posy
lyric:
Rosy my posy
You're sleepy and dozy
Come sit upon Grandmother's knee

Songs I will sing you
Sweet sleep to bring you
Come cuddle up cozy with me

Rosy my posy
You're sleepy and dozy
Come sit upon Grandmother's knee

To cuddle up cozy
My sweet little Rosy
And hush-a-bye baby with me
